sense.def:
Kadar neko stanje, odnos ali čustvo
wanes
, postane šibkejše in na koncu pogosto popolnoma izgine.

seg.quote: Her enthusiasm for Harold was beginning to wane.
The influence of this group waned considerably.

sense.def:
Kadar je neko stanje, odnos ali čustvo
on the wane
, postaja šibkejše.

seg.quote: They could claim that pollution for the first time was on the wane.
